patthana21.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:2.1_1: Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:2.1_2: Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:4.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:4.1_2: Nahetuṁ naabyākatañca nanahetuṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
